message.empty: ó_Are you sure you want to delete this folder, ${title}_________________________________________________à?
message.mustBeEmpty: ó_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted___________________________________________________à.
message.aFewCannotBeDeleted: ó_A few items cannot be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting the rest_____________________________________________à?
